column1: ED Moratalaz is a Spanish football team based in Madrid
column2: in the neighbourhood of Moratalaz. Founded in 2006
column3: plays in Tercera división. The team´s stadium is the Dehesa de Moratalaz with capacity of 1

column1: Escuela Deportiva Moratalaz is created in the year 2006 by the merger of two teams: Club Deportivo Moratalaz and Escuela Deportiva Unión de Moratalaz.
